net.jawr.web.config.jmx
Interface JawrApplicationConfigManagerMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
JawrApplicationConfigManager
public interface JawrApplicationConfigManagerMBean

This interface defines the MBean which manage the Jawr configuration for a we application, so it will affect all JawrConfigManagerMBean associated to Jawr Servlets.

Author:
Ibrahim Chaehoi

addDebugSessionId

void addDebugSessionId(java.lang.String sessionId)
Add a session ID, to the set of debug session ID. All request make by sessions where their IDs is contained in the debug session Set, will be threated as in debug mode.

Parameters:
sessionId - the session ID to add

removeDebugSessionId

void removeDebugSessionId(java.lang.String sessionId)
Add a session ID, to the set of debug session ID. All request make by sessions where their IDs is contained in the debug session Set, will be threated as in debug mode.

Parameters:
sessionId - the session ID to add

removeAllDebugSessionId

void removeAllDebugSessionId()

sessionId - the session ID to remove
